statements: SELECT id, employee_id, location, breach_timestamp FROM geofence_breaches
SELECT employee_id, location, breach_timestamp, id FROM geofence_breaches
SELECT location, id, breach_timestamp, employee_id FROM geofence_breaches
SELECT * FROM geofence_breaches WHERE employee_id = 123
SELECT id, location FROM geofence_breaches ORDER BY breach_timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM geofence_breaches WHERE employee_id = 123 ORDER BY breach_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, employee_id, location FROM geofence_breaches WHERE breach_timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND location LIKE '%office%';
SELECT * FROM geofence_breaches WHERE location = 'Main Entrance' OR location = 'Back Door' ORDER BY breach_timestamp ASC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS breach_count FROM geofence_breaches GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;

SELECT employee_id, DATE_TRUNC('hour', breach_timestamp) AS hour_interval, COUNT(*) AS breach_count FROM geofence_breaches GROUP BY employee_id, hour_interval ORDER BY employee_id ASC, hour_interval DESC;
SELECT * FROM geofence_breaches;
SELECT location, timestamp FROM geofence_breaches WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT log_text, log_timestamp FROM compliance_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT location FROM geofence_breaches WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM compliance_logs WHERE geofence_breach_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM geofence_breaches WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM geofence_breaches WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM geofence_breaches;
SELECT g.*, c.log_text FROM geofence_breaches g INNER JOIN compliance_logs c ON g.id = c.geofence_breach_id WHERE c.log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(id) AS total_breaches FROM geofence_breaches GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 5 ORDER BY total_breaches DESC;
SELECT * FROM geofence_breaches;
SELECT location, timestamp FROM geofence_breaches WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT reason, timestamp FROM geofence_breaches ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM geofence_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM geofence_breaches WHERE reason = 'Area Restricted' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) FROM geofence_breaches GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT gb.location, gl.description FROM geofence_breaches gb JOIN geofence_logs gl ON gb.id = gl.breach_id;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM user_roles WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_roles WHERE role='Admin');
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM geofence_breaches WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT breach_id, location, breach_time FROM geofence_breaches ORDER BY breach_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, role FROM users ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT geofence_name, geofence_type FROM geofences WHERE geofence_type = 'restricted';
SELECT * FROM geofence_breaches WHERE breach_time > NOW() ORDER BY breach_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, breach_reason FROM geofence_breaches WHERE breach_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY breach_time ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' OR role = 'manager';
SELECT geofence_name, geofence_type FROM geofences WHERE geofence_type = 'restricted' ORDER BY geofence_name;
SELECT u.username, g.geofence_name, uga.access_level FROM users u JOIN user_geofence_access uga ON u.user_id = uga.user_id JOIN geofences g ON g.geofence_id = uga.geofence_id WHERE u.role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM geofence_breaches;
SELECT user_id, location, timestamp FROM geofence_breaches ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_breaches FROM geofence_breaches GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT geofence_name, ST_AsText(boundary_polygon) AS boundary FROM geofences;
SELECT * FROM geofence_breaches ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, location FROM geofence_breaches WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT geofence_name, ST_AsText(boundary_polygon) FROM geofences
SELECT * FROM security_logs WHERE event_type = 'Authentication' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM compliance_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY timestamp
